◆ skew_norm_pos() [1/2]

float bdsp::maps::skew_norm_pos ( float  val,
float  skew 
)
inline

Map a value in [0.0, 1.0] to the same interval with a skew factor.

skew = 1.0 gives a linear map skew in [0.0, 1.0[ gives more resolution in the lower range skew in [1.0, INF[ gives more resolution in the upper range

Parameters
NormValNormalised value to map
skewSkew factor
Returns
Mapped value

Definition at line 99 of file maps.h.

101  return powf(val, 1.0f / skew);

◆ prewarp()

float bdsp::maps::prewarp ( const float  freq,
const float  sample_rate 
)
inline

Prewarp a frequency to be preserved in trapezoidal integration.

To be used with bilinear transformation, topology-preserving transformation, etc.

Parameters
freqFrequency to be preserved
sample_rateSample rate of the system
Returns
Prewarped frequency
